metadata.synopsis: A waveservant that is busy in the kitchen area of Water Queen's HouseAfter the Beastmaster quest is completed, the ceremony is no longer going on, so they have a different dialog then.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to CTY_Main_Agoto -263.6; 5.5; -263.5812. Talk to the waveservant

0.speaker: Untaken Zastreya
0.text: Finally some peace and quiet. Too bad about all the cleanup.
0.context: NodeContext: Relieved (but still a little annoyed on the last sentence)

1.speaker: Untaken Zastreya
1.text: Unless you're gonna roll up your sleeves, you can get out of my kitchen. Please.
1.context: NodeContext: Mildly annoyed; she has things to do (the "please" is definitely an afterthought)

2.speaker: Untaken Zastreya
2.text: Out from under my feet, little weed.
2.context: NodeContext: Irritated (is calling the player "little weed")

3.speaker: Untaken Zastreya
3.text: Fish's piss - I loved Holli as much as anyone, but they've been wailing and praying for hours. My best pot for a bit of quiet.
3.context: NodeContext: Annoyed by the loud funeral singing next door; "fish's piss" said as if it's a swear
